column5: Just got it tonight.  Can't wait to use her.
not as long as you might think.  Middle of May and it can definately be used.
Well you just caught yourself some more fish! Congrats!   TDunn
haha after our trip I knew it wouldnt take long.  Put her to use.

OK, some one fill in the blanks for the newbie~!   **EDIT**  Funny enough... I clicked on the ad at the top of the page... Took me to fishing world website... clicked on the SHOP NOW!  And the first thing in the shop is a ice fishing flasher... Is that what it is? lol
I gotz the same one Chris, you definitely won't be disappointed.
Nice...that will really shine on the ice!!!!
I got one of their competitors units last spring and it has enabled me to catch a ton of fish I wouldn't have before I got it. I'll be out again this weekend chasing lakers!!!
Nice one Cudz....they really come into their own on the ice though.
I think he already does well in that department.  Simcoe will be cleaned out now  Congrats, nice unit!  Joey
